tooltip.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
tooltip.lore: A torrential flood takes enemies by force.

tooltip.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier.  If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. Passively grants bonus Agility. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3 second cooldown.
tooltip.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

tooltip.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. Passively grants bonus Strength. \n\n Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3 second cooldown.
tooltip.lore: The Morphling calls upon his elements to crush his opponents with waves.

tooltip.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
tooltip.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

tooltip.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.
tooltip.lore: Shifting water makes it difficult to discern the nature of Morphling.

tooltip.description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.
tooltip.lore: Staring into Morphling produces a reflection that mimics the beholder.
tooltip.scepter_description: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.

items.name: Magic Wand
items.active: [h1]Active: Energy Charge[/h1]Instantly restores [b]15[/b] health and mana per charge stored. \n\nMax [b]20[/b] charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within [b]1200[/b] range uses an ability.

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

entries.name: +25% X Marks the Spot Move Speed

tooltip.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
tooltip.lore: An ancestral rush of water explodes from the center of the world, called upon by the Admiral.

tooltip.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.
tooltip.lore: A lost Claddish soul inhabits Kunkka's trusty Tidebringer, empowering it to destroy demons of the Cataract.

tooltip.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkkoiza can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.
tooltip.lore: The Admiral's set of arcane abilities includes some that can be used for battle as well as entertainment.

tooltip.description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area within 1100 range of the target position once every 0.25 for 4.0 seconds.
tooltip.lore: A hundred leagues of dry land couldn't keep these seas at bay.

tooltip.description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.
tooltip.lore: The final ship of the Claddish Navy is nothing but a phantom, but it is all too real to the enemies of the Admiral.

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.name: Quelling Blade
items.active:
[h1]Active: Chop Tree[/h1] Destroy a target tree. 

Cast Range: [b]350[/b]

tooltip.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by 100% for 0.4 seconds.  Provides vision of its target.
tooltip.lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.

tooltip.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions. Deals damage based on distance glimpsed, with max damage dealt at 1400 distance.
tooltip.lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.

tooltip.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
tooltip.lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.

tooltip.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.
tooltip.lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.name: Tango
items.use:
[h1]Use: Devour[/h1] Consumes a target tree to gain [b]7.0[/b] health regeneration for [b]16.0[/b] seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with [b]3[/b] charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: [b]165[/b]

items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.name: Blood Grenade
items.use: [h1]Use: Throw Grenade[/h1] Throw a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take [b]50[/b] damage on impact, and be slowed by [b]-15[/b]% and take [b]15[/b] damage every [b]1[/b]s for [b]5[/b] seconds. Radius [b][object Object][/b].

items.name: Enchanted Mango
items.use: [h1]Use: Eat Mango[/h1] Instantly restores [b]100[/b] mana.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

tooltip.description: Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit.  The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.\nIf point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets.  The ability may be placed on alt-cast to force this behavior.
tooltip.lore: Though she'll make do with almost anything, Oak and Ironwood acorns make the most effective projectiles -- and the bulk of Hoodwink's stash.

tooltip.description: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemies if they are near a tree in the area.  Affected enemies take damage over time and are pulled towards the tree nearest to them within the target area, and have their vision reduced to 0 for the duration of the stun.
tooltip.lore: Hoodwink favors Ironwood groves for ambushes, but the wary step carefully in all areas of the mistwoods.

tooltip.description: Hoodwink passively has a chance to evade physical attacks while near trees.  When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, attack and cast range, phased movement, and tree-walking for a brief time.
tooltip.lore: There's not a nook or cranny in the Wood Tomo'kan out of reach of Hoodwink's paws.

tooltip.description: Hoodwink turns invisible, increasing her movement speed, and creates a decoy illusion that starts aiming a decreased damage Sharpshooter at the nearest enemy hero. If the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and it throws a lesser bushwhack towards the enemy.

Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage.

Hoodwink charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow, dealing heavy damage, break and slow to an enemy Hero.  The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after 3.0 seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after 5.0 seconds.\nHoodwink is knocked backwards for a distance of 350 from the force of the shot. Creeps hit by the bolt are damaged for half the values.
tooltip.lore: While her first arbalest was a chance discovery, Hoodwink now takes great care in carving and caring for her own -- of course with some necessary components pilfered or otherwise cleverly procured.

items.name: Faerie Fire
items.use: [h1]Use: Imbue[/h1] Instantly restores [b]85[/b] health.

items.name: Blood Grenade
items.use: [h1]Use: Throw Grenade[/h1] Throw a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take [b]50[/b] damage on impact, and be slowed by [b]-15[/b]% and take [b]15[/b] damage every [b]1[/b]s for [b]5[/b] seconds. Radius [b][object Object][/b].

entries.name: +6% Arc Lightning Current Health As Damage

tooltip.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.
tooltip.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

tooltip.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range. Deals 100% more damage to creeps.
tooltip.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

tooltip.description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.
Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
Zeus gains bonus attack range and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.

Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Does a flat amount of damage and additional damage based on the max health of the target.\n\nThundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
tooltip.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

tooltip.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.
tooltip.lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.

tooltip.description:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed and damaged for 5s.

 If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health. Enchantress can control up to 1 creeps at a time for up to 30s. 

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
tooltip.lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.
tooltip.scepter_description: Enchantress can control multiple creeps at a time.

tooltip.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 9 seconds.
tooltip.lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.

tooltip.description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 2 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 100.
tooltip.lore: Sproink is as Sproink does.

tooltip.description: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for 6 seconds.
Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.
tooltip.lore: After attacking Aiushtha, most opponents are overwhelmed with guilt having attacked such a natural beauty.

items.name: Blood Grenade
items.use: [h1]Use: Throw Grenade[/h1] Throw a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take [b]50[/b] damage on impact, and be slowed by [b]-15[/b]% and take [b]15[/b] damage every [b]1[/b]s for [b]5[/b] seconds. Radius [b][object Object][/b].

Comes with [b]3[/b] charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: [b]165[/b]

items.name: Sentry Ward
items.use:
[h1]Use: Plant[/h1] Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a [b]1000[/b] radius. Lasts [b]7[/b] minutes. Does not grant ground vision. Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

Range: [b]500[/b]

tooltip.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
tooltip.lore: The Rogue Knight's iron gauntlet, taken from the school of his father, strikes his foes to their core.
tooltip.scepter_description: Increases cast range and applies a basic dispel on the target. Can be cast on invulnerable targets. If alt-cast, it deals an additional 180 damage and Sven travels with the Storm Hammer.

tooltip.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack. Passively grants bonus Strength.
tooltip.lore: The Vigil Knights still seek to reclaim the stolen Outcast Blade from Sven, a weapon capable of cutting wide swaths through lesser warriors.

tooltip.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 10 seconds.
tooltip.lore: Calling a few lines from the Vigil Codex fortifies Sven's obedience to his rogue code. So poetic!

tooltip.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage and slow resistance for 35 seconds.
tooltip.lore: With the strength that shattered the Sacred Helm, the Rogue Knight stands unopposed in melee combat.

items.name: Quelling Blade
items.active:
[h1]Active: Chop Tree[/h1] Destroy a target tree. 

Cast Range: [b]350[/b]

entries.name: +6 Max / +1 Hero Attack Reactive Armor Stacks

tooltip.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.
tooltip.lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.

tooltip.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.
tooltip.lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.

tooltip.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor. Hero attacks are counted as 3x the amount.
tooltip.lore: The saw-suit is equipped to react to the slightest touch with fortified defenses.

tooltip.description: Launches a second independent Chakram.
tooltip.lore: Cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut cut!

tooltip.description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.

Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.
tooltip.lore: The ultimate in anti-flora weaponry.
tooltip.scepter_description: Increases Chakram and Second Chakram damage per second.

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

entries.name: Static Link Steals 1 Armor per Second
--0.10s Eye of the Storm Strike Interval
Creates A Second Plasma Field Delayed By 0.8s

tooltip.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.
tooltip.lore: The Lightning Revenant rules the Underscape with plasmatic power.

tooltip.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.
tooltip.lore: Razor's polarity channels electricity into his being, draining the power of his opposition.

tooltip.description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed. There's a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release a forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, prioritizing the unit type of the attacker, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.
tooltip.lore: Merely approaching the Lightning Revenant is rewarded with shock therapy.

tooltip.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.
tooltip.lore: Ride the lightning.
tooltip.scepter_description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

Tree Range: [b]165[/b]

items.name: Iron Branch
items.use: [h1]Use: Plant Tree[/h1] Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for [b]20[/b] seconds.\n\nRange: [b]400[/b]

tooltip.description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit in a 200 radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units. Deals 1.4x damage to creeps.
tooltip.lore: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.

tooltip.description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing 60 + 100% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
tooltip.lore: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.

tooltip.description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.
tooltip.lore: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.

tooltip.description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time. Gains additional charges every 5 hero levels.
tooltip.lore: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.

tooltip.description: Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>\nCan be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.\nHas a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.
tooltip.lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.

tooltip.description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
tooltip.lore: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.

items.name: Tango
items.use:
[h1]Use: Devour[/h1] Consumes a target tree to gain [b]7.0[/b] health regeneration for [b]16.0[/b] seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with [b]3[/b] charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: [b]165[/b]

items.name: Faerie Fire
items.use: [h1]Use: Imbue[/h1] Instantly restores [b]85[/b] health.
